manifest.name: SubMaker - Subtitle Translator

fileUpload.loadFailed: Failed to load file translation page

hero.title: Pick a tool without leaving your stream
hero.body: Use the Sub Toolbox button in Stremio's subtitle list. Your saved API keys, target languages, and cache come with you automatically.

toast.title: New stream detected
toast.meta: A different episode is playing in Stremio.

translate.title: Translate SRT files
translate.body: Upload .srt/.vtt/.ass files and keep cache + language preferences intact.

embedded.title: Extract + Translate
embedded.body: Pull subtitles from the current stream or file, then translate with your provider.

sync.title: Sync subtitles
sync.body: Fix timing drifts with offsets or the Chrome extension and save back to your session.

auto.title: Automatic subtitles
auto.body: Create subs when none exist. Uses your target language and provider settings.

logs.linkedChanged: Linked stream changed. Outputs cleared; run extraction again for the new stream.
logs.noProgress: No extraction progress for {minutes} minute(s). Resetting extraction; please retry.
logs.cacheSaveFailed: Failed to save track {id} to cache: {reason}
logs.extensionMissing: Extension not detected yet. Install SubMaker xSync and wait for detection.
logs.invalidUrl: Invalid stream URL. Paste a full http/https link.
logs.selectSubtitle: Select a subtitle in Step 1 outputs first.

toolbox.footnote: Toolbox is tied to your current session and stream. Keep this tab open while streaming for the smoothest handoff.

validation.mainProviderGeminiMissing: Gemini API key and model are required for the main provider
validation.mainProviderConfigured: API key, model, and enabled status are required for main provider '{provider}'
validation.secondaryMissing: Secondary provider must be selected when enabled
validation.secondaryDifferent: Secondary provider must be different from main provider
validation.secondaryGemini: Gemini API key and model are required for the secondary provider
validation.secondaryConfigured: API key, model, and enabled status are required for secondary provider '{provider}'
validation.atLeastOneProvider: At least one AI provider must be enabled with an API key and model
validation.secondaryTwoProviders: Secondary Provider requires two configured AI providers with API keys
validation.noTranslationMissing: At least one no-translation language must be selected
validation.sourceMissing: At least one source language must be selected
validation.targetMissing: At least one target language must be selected
validation.targetLimit: Maximum of {limit} total target languages allowed (including Learn Mode)
validation.learnTargetMissing: Learn Mode requires at least one target language
validation.sessionTokenError: Configuration Error: Session token not found or expired. Please reconfigure the addon to continue using it.

subtitle.loadingBody: Click to reload. Partial results will appear as they are ready.
subtitle.loadingTail: Reload this subtitle later to get more
subtitle.infoNote: This informational subtitle was generated by the addon.
subtitle.sessionErrorBody: Your session token was not found or has expired.
subtitle.sessionErrorAdvice: Please reconfig and reinstall the addon.
subtitle.sessionErrorQuickFix: Quick fix: Open this link to reinstall with fresh config:
subtitle.sessionErrorToken: A fresh config was created. Use this token to reinstall:
subtitle.sessionErrorFooter: Something is wrong or an update broke your SubMaker config. Sorry! Please reconfig and reinstall the addon.
subtitle.osAuthFailBody: Please fix your username/password in addon config
subtitle.osQuotaBody: You have downloaded the allowed 20 subtitles in the last 24 hours. Wait until UTC midnight (00:00) or change to V3 on config page.
subtitle.osAuthMissingBody: Add your OpenSubtitles username/password in the addon config or switch to V3 (no login needed).
subtitle.osV3RateBody: Too many requests to the V3 service. Please wait a few minutes and try again.
subtitle.osV3UnavailableBody: Service temporarily unavailable. Try again in a few minutes.
subtitle.concurrencyLimitTitle: Too many concurrent translations for this user (limit: {limit}).
subtitle.concurrencyLimitBody: Please wait for one to finish, then try again.
subtitle.translationUnexpected: An unexpected error occurred during translation.
subtitle.translationRetry: An unexpected error occurred.\nClick this subtitle again to retry translation.
subtitle.translationAuthBody: Your Gemini API key is invalid or rejected.\nPlease check that your API key is correct.
subtitle.translationAuthRetry: Update your Gemini API key in the addon configuration,\nthen reinstall the addon and try again.
subtitle.translationOverloadBody: The Gemini API is temporarily overloaded with requests.\nThis is usually temporary and resolves within minutes.
subtitle.translationOverloadRetry: (503) Service Unavailable - Wait a moment for Gemini to recover,\nthen click this subtitle again to retry translation.
subtitle.translationRateLimitBody: Your Gemini API usage limit has been exceeded.\nThis may be a rate limit or quota limit.
subtitle.translationRateLimitRetry: (429) API Rate/Quota Limit - Gemini API is limiting your API key requests.\nWait a few minutes, then click again to retry.
subtitle.translationTooLargeBody: The subtitle file is too large for a single translation.\nThe system attempted chunking but still exceeded limits.
subtitle.translationTooLargeRetry: (MAX_TOKENS) Try translating a different subtitle file.\nAnother model may help. Please let us know if this persists.
subtitle.translationFilteredBody: The subtitle content was blocked by safety filters.\nThis is rare and usually a false positive.
subtitle.translationFilteredRetry: (PROHIBITED_CONTENT) Subtitle content was filtered by Gemini.\nPlease retry, or try a different subtitle from the list.
subtitle.translationInvalidSourceBody: The source subtitle file appears corrupted or invalid.\nIt may be too small or have formatting issues.
subtitle.translationInvalidSourceRetry: (CORRUPT_SOURCE) Please retry or try a different subtitle from the list.
subtitle.translationMultiProvider: Both the main and secondary providers failed to translate this batch.
subtitle.osAuthRateLimited: OpenSubtitles is rate limiting your account. Wait a few minutes, then retry or switch to V3 in the addon config.
subtitle.osAuthMissingRateLimited: OpenSubtitles Auth mode is active without credentials, so downloads hit the basic rate limit. Add your username/password or switch to V3 (no login).
subtitle.providerRateLimitBody: Too many requests in a short period.\nPlease wait a few minutes and try again.
subtitle.providerAuthErrorBody: {service} rejected your API key or credentials
subtitle.notAvailableBody: This often happens with subtitles that were removed.\nPlease try a different subtitle from the list
subtitle.providerUnavailableBody: Please try again in a few minutes or try a different subtitle.
subtitle.subsourceTimeoutBody: SubSource API did not respond in time. Try again in a few minutes or pick a different subtitle.
subtitle.invalidSubtitleTooSmall: The subtitle file is too small and seems corrupted.

subtitleErrors.invalidGenericReason: The subtitle file appears to be invalid or incomplete.
subtitleErrors.addonInfoNote: This informational subtitle was generated by the addon.

status.waitingStream: Waiting for a linked stream before loading subtitles.
status.none: No subtitles available for this stream yet.

noTranslation.title: Just Fetch Subtitles (No Translation)
noTranslation.description: Skip AI translation and just fetch subtitles in your chosen languages

opensubs.implDescription: Choose your preferred OpenSubtitles implementation below.
opensubs.v3Tooltip: V3 doesn't show all OpenSubtitles results and rate-limiting may apply.
opensubs.v3Description: Uses the official Stremio OpenSubtitles V3 addon. No authentication required, simple setup.
opensubs.authDescription: Uses your OpenSubtitles account with API key authentication. Requires username/password.
opensubs.rateNote: 20 subtitles a day. Create a free account if you don't have one.

limits.sourceDescription: You can select up to {max} source language(s), but only 1 is recommended (so you have the same list order when translating). All subtitles from this language will be available for translation in the translation selector AND will be fetched (original subtitles will show up).
limits.targetDescription: Subtitles in target languages will be fetched AND translation buttons will appear for translating FROM the source language TO these languages. You can select up to {max} total target languages (including Learn Mode).
limits.noTranslationDescription: Select which languages you want to fetch subtitles in (up to {max}).

validation.sourceRequired: Please select at least one source language
validation.targetLimitShort: Please select up to {limit} target languages (including Learn Mode)
validation.noTranslationRequired: Please select at least one language for Just Fetch mode
validation.noTranslationLimitShort: Please select up to {limit} languages for Just Fetch mode
validation.opensubsAuthMode: Switch to Auth mode to test your credentials.
validation.credentialsRequired: Please enter both username and password

alerts.sessionLost: Config session was lost. Please reconfigure and save to create a new session.
alerts.loadLanguagesExhausted: Failed to load languages after {retries} attempts: {reason}. Please refresh the page.
alerts.sourceLimit: You can only select up to {limit} source languages
alerts.targetLimit: You can only select up to {limit} total target languages (including Learn Mode)
alerts.noTranslationLimit: You can only select up to {limit} languages in Just Fetch mode
alerts.saveConfigFirst: Save your config first to open Sub Toolbox.
alerts.missingCfWorkers: Cloudflare Workers AI key must be in ACCOUNT_ID|TOKEN format
alerts.missingProviderKey: Add an API key for {provider} to load models

fileUpload.title: File Translation
fileUpload.subtitle: Upload and translate your subtitle files

drop.limit: Select up to {max} files or drag and drop
drop.hint: We queue uploads and run {count} at a time to avoid rate limits.

instructions.title: How It Works
instructions.step1: Upload your subtitle file(s) (any supported format, up to {max} at once)
instructions.step3: Click "Translate" and wait for the magic âœ¨

popup.title: SubMaker xSync
popup.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset the extension? This will clear all settings and data.
popup.resetFailed: Failed to reset extension. Please try removing and reinstalling it.

options.title: SubMaker xSync Settings
options.subtitle: Settings & Configuration
options.autoSyncHint: Keep automatic syncing active whenever SubMaker is detected.
options.statusRefreshHint: How often the popup refreshes job stats.
options.linksHint: Open the configure and toolbox pages once and weâ€™ll remember the URLs.
options.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset the extension? This will clear all settings and data.
